Author: stu_utterguy
Title: Quick Q
Content: Hey, I don't know much about computers but I'm interested in learning how to make great web pages, Web 2.0 Apps,and Facebook Apps.  Right now, I have been brushing up on C++ and Pascal (languages I have previously learned).  Basically what is the right progression for me to develop the skills for the aforementioned?
